atk-s0508a10:14_0: Therehi bhāsitā gāthā, therīhi ca nirāmisā.
atk-s0508a10:33_2: kāmañcāyamattho gāthāsu vuttoyeva pākaṭakaraṇatthaṁ pana punapi vuccate –
atk-s0508a10:33_4: Yā hi te attanā yathādhigataṁ maggaphalasukhaṁ paccavekkhitvā kāci udānavasena,
atk-s0508a10:33_8: tā sabbā saṅgītikāle ekajjhaṁ katvā ‘‘theragāthā’’icceva dhammasaṅgāhakehi saṅgītā.
atk-s0508a10:34_6: khuddakanikāyoti pañcasu nikāyesu khuddakanikāyapariyāpannā, suttaṁ, geyyaṁ,
atk-s0508a10:37_0: Evaṁ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena paṭiññātesu caturāsītiyā dhammakkhandhasahassesu katipayadhammakkhandhasaṅgahaṁ gatā.
atk-s0508a10:38_0: Tattha theragāthā tāva nipātato ekanipāto ekuttaravasena yāva cuddasanipātāti cuddasanipāto soḷasanipāto
atk-s0508a10:38_1: vīsatinipāto tiṁsanipāto cattālīsanipāto paññāsanipāto saṭṭhinipāto sattatinipātoti ekavīsatinipātasaṅgahā.
atk-s0508a10:38_3: Eko ekeko gāthānaṁ nipāto nikkhepo etthāti ekanipāto.
atk-s0508a10:39_1: Ekekasmiṁ vagge dasa dasa katvā vīsuttarasataṁ therā,
atk-s0508a10:42_41: Sampiṇḍetvā pana dvesatāni catusaṭṭhi ca therā,
atk-s0508a10:42_42: sahassaṁ tīṇi satāni saṭṭhi ca gāthāti.
atk-s0508a10:43_0: ‘‘Sahassaṁ honti tā gāthā, tīṇi saṭṭhi satāni ca;
atk-s0508a10:44_0: Therā ca dve satā saṭṭhi, cattāro ca pakāsitā’’ti.
atk-s0508a10:45_0: Therīgāthā pana ekanipāto ekuttaravasena yāva navanipātāti navanipāto ekādasanipāto,
atk-s0508a10:45_19: aṭṭha nipātato paṭṭhāya yāva soḷasanipātā ekekā theriyo taṁtaṁnipātaparimāṇā gāthā;
atk-s0508a10:45_28: Evamettha nipātānaṁ gāthāvaggānaṁ gāthānañca parimāṇaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a10:47_0: Evaṁ paricchinnaparimāṇāsu panetāsu theragāthā ādi. Tatthāpi –
atk-s0508a10:50_0: Ayaṁ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle āyasmatā ānandena tesaṁ therānaṁ thomanatthaṁ bhāsitā gāthā ādi.
atk-s0508a10:50_5: ‘‘Atha kho sīho senāpati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī’’tiādīsu (a. ni.
atk-s0508a10:50_22: Yathā hi ‘‘oṭṭhasseva mukhaṁ etassā’’ti vutte oṭṭhassa mukhaṁ viya mukhaṁ etassāti ayamattho vutto eva hoti,
atk-s0508a10:50_23: evamidhāpi ‘‘sīhānaṁvā’’ti vutte sīhānaṁ nādo viyāti ayamattho vutto eva hoti.
atk-s0508a10:50_35: liṅgaṁ pana parivattetvā ‘‘sīhīna’’ntiādinā itthiliṅgavasenāpi attho veditabbo.
atk-s0508a10:50_36: Ekasesavasena vā sīhā ca sīhiyo ca sīhā,
atk-s0508a10:50_37: tesaṁ sīhānantiādinā sādhāraṇā hetā tisso nidānagāthā theragāthānaṁ therīgāthānañcāti.
atk-s0508a10:51_1: Yathā hi sīhassa migarañño balavisesayogato sarabhamigamattavaravāraṇāditopi parissayo nāma natthi,
atk-s0508a10:51_3: gocarāya pakkamantopi tejussadatāya mattagandhahatthivanamahiṁsādike samāgantvā abhīrū achambhī abhibhavati,
atk-s0508a10:51_4: abhibhavanto ca te aññadatthu hantvā tattha mudumaṁsāni bhakkhayitvā sukheneva viharati,
atk-s0508a10:51_5: evametepi mahātherā ariyabalavisesayogena sabbesampi parissayānaṁ sahanato,
atk-s0508a10:51_6: rāgādisaṁkilesabalassa abhibhavitvā hananato pajahanato tejussadabhāvena kutocipi abhīrū achambhī jhānādisukhena
atk-s0508a10:51_7: viharantīti sahanato hananato ca sīhā viyāti sīhā.
atk-s0508a10:51_8: Saddatthato pana yathā kantanatthena ādiantavipallāsato takkaṁ vuccati,
atk-s0508a10:51_11: Pisodarādipakkhepena niruttinayena pana vuccamāne vattabbameva natthi.
atk-s0508a10:52_0: Atha vā yathā migarājā kesarasīho attano tejussadatāya ekacārī viharati,
atk-s0508a10:52_2: evametepi tejussadatāya vivekābhiratiyā ca ekacārinoti ekacariyaṭṭhenapi sīhā viyāti sīhā, tenāha –
atk-s0508a10:53_0: Atha vā asantāsanajavaparakkamādivisesayogato sīhā viyāti sīhā,
atk-s0508a10:54_4: Bhikkhu ca khīṇāsavo sīho ca migarājā’’ti (a. ni. 2.60).
atk-s0508a10:55_2: Tathā hi so usabhasatampi laṅghitvā vanamahiṁsādīsu nipatati,
atk-s0508a10:55_3: potakopi samāno pabhinnamadānampi mattavaravāraṇānaṁ paṭimānaṁ bhinditvā dantakaḷīraṁva khādati.
atk-s0508a10:55_4: Etesaṁ pana ariyamaggajavo iddhijavo ca aññehi asādhāraṇo,
atk-s0508a10:56_1: Gocaraparakkamatuṭṭhivelādīsu hi yathā sīhā attano āsayato nikkhamitvā vijambhitvā sīhanādaṁ abhītanādaṁ nadanti,
atk-s0508a10:56_2: evaṁ etepi visayajjhattapaccavekkhaṇaudānādikālesu imaṁ abhītanādaṁ nadiṁsu.
atk-s0508a10:56_8: Yathā hi sīhā ativiya daḷhānaṁ tikkhānañca catunnaṁ dāṭhānaṁ balena paṭipakkhaṁ abhibhavitvā attano manorathaṁ matthakaṁ pūrenti,
atk-s0508a10:56_9: evametepi catunnaṁ ariyamaggadāṭhānaṁ balena anādimati saṁsāre anabhibhūtapubbapaṭipakkhaṁ abhibhavitvā attano manorathaṁ matthakaṁ pāpesuṁ.
atk-s0508a10:56_10: Idhāpi dāṭhā viyāti dāṭhāti sadisakappanāvaseneva attho veditabbo.
atk-s0508a10:57_4: Idaṁ pana nesaṁ virocanaṭṭhānadassanañceva sīhanādassa yogyabhūmidassanañca.
atk-s0508a10:57_6: Yathā hi sīhā yebhuyyena girigabbhare aññehi durāsadatāya janavivitte vasantā attano dassanena uppajjanakassa
atk-s0508a10:57_8: evametepi aññehi durāsadagirigabbharasadiseva suññāgārevasantā guṇehi khuddakānaṁ puthujjanānaṁ taṇhādiṭṭhiparittāsaparivajjanatthaṁ
atk-s0508a10:58_1: tena vakkhamānānaṁ gāthānaṁ sannipatitāya parisāya sotukāmataṁ uppādento savane ādaraṁ janeti,
atk-s0508a10:58_3: Atha vā ‘‘sīhāna’’ntiādīnaṁ padānaṁ sadisakappanāya vinā mukhyavaseneva attho veditabbo.
atk-s0508a10:58_4: Tasmā daḷhatikkhabhāvena pasaṭṭhātisayadāṭhatāya dāṭhīnaṁ girigabbhare nadantānaṁ sīhagajjitaṁ gajjantānaṁ
atk-s0508a10:58_5: sīhānaṁ migarājūnaṁ viya tesaṁ abhītanādasadisā gāthā suṇāthāti attho.
atk-s0508a10:58_7: ‘‘yathā sīhanādaṁ nadantānaṁ sīhānaṁ migarājūnaṁ kutocipi bhayābhāvato so abhītanādo tadaññamigasantāsakaro,
atk-s0508a10:58_8: evaṁ bhāvitattānaṁ appamattānaṁ therānaṁ sīhanādasadisiyo sabbaso bhayahetūnaṁ suppahīnattā abhītanādabhūtā,
atk-s0508a10:59_2: 159) yo ve ṭhitatto tasaraṁva ujjū’’ti (su. ni.
atk-s0508a10:59_5: tasmā adhicittānuyogena samathavipassanābhivaḍḍhitacittānaṁ samathavipassanābhāvanāmatthakaṁ pāpetvā ṭhitānanti attho.
atk-s0508a10:59_9: anuṭṭhubhādivasena isīhi pavattitaṁ catuppadaṁ chappadaṁ vā vacanaṁ.
atk-s0508a10:59_11: Attatthādibhede atthe upanenti tesu vā upaniyyantīti atthūpanāyikā.
atk-s0508a10:60_1: attabhāvo hi āhito ahaṁ māno etthāti ‘‘attā’’ti vuccati,
atk-s0508a10:60_2: so ca tehi appamādabhāvanāya anavajjabhāvanāya bhāvito sammadeva guṇagandhaṁ gāhāpito.
atk-s0508a10:60_3: Tena tesaṁ kāyabhāvanā sīlabhāvanā cittabhāvanā paññābhāvanāti catunnampi bhāvanānaṁ paripuṇṇabhāvaṁ dasseti.
atk-s0508a10:60_7: Sambodhi pana tividhā sammāsambodhi paccekasambodhi sāvakasambodhīti.
atk-s0508a10:60_8: Tattha sammā sāmaṁ sabbadhammānaṁ bujjhanato bodhanato ca sammāsambodhi.
atk-s0508a10:60_9: Sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṁ maggañāṇaṁ maggañāṇapadaṭṭhānañca sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ ‘‘sammāsambodhī’’ti vuccati. Tenāha –
atk-s0508a10:61_0: ‘‘Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhi,
atk-s0508a10:61_1: tattha ca sabbaññutaṁ patto balesu ca vasībhāva’’nti (mahāni. 192; cūḷani.
atk-s0508a10:62_3: Sammāsambuddhānañhi sayambhūñāṇatāya sayameva pavattamānopi saccābhisamayo sānubuddho aparimāṇānaṁ sattānaṁ saccābhisamayassa hetubhāvato.
atk-s0508a10:62_4: Imesaṁ pana so ekassāpi sattassa saccābhisamayahetu na hoti.
atk-s0508a10:62_7: Tividhāpesā tiṇṇaṁ bodhisattānaṁ yathāsakaṁ āgamanīyapaṭipadāya matthakappattiyā satipaṭṭhānādīnaṁ sattatiṁsāya
atk-s0508a10:62_9: Na hi sacchikiriyābhisamayena vinā bhāvanābhisamayo sambhavati,
atk-s0508a10:62_10: sati ca bhāvanābhisamaye pahānābhisamayo pariññābhisamayo ca siddhoyeva hotīti.
atk-s0508a10:63_0: Yadā hi mahābodhisatto paripūritabodhisambhāro carimabhave katapubbakicco bodhimaṇḍaṁ āruyha –
atk-s0508a10:63_2: yāva na me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccissatī’’ti paṭiññaṁ katvā aparājitapallaṅke nisinno asampattāya
atk-s0508a10:63_3: eva sañjhāvelāya mārabalaṁ vidhamitvā purimayāme pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena anekākāravokāre pubbe nivutthakkhandhe
atk-s0508a10:63_4: anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuvisodhanena cutūpapātañāṇaanāgataṁsañāṇāni adhigantvā pacchimayāme
atk-s0508a10:63_5: ‘‘kicchaṁ vatāyaṁ loko āpanno jāyati ca jīyati ca mīyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca,
atk-s0508a10:63_6: atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṁ nappajānāti jarāmaraṇassā’’tiādinā (dī. ni.
atk-s0508a10:63_7: 2.57) jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya paṭiccasamuppādamukhena vipassanaṁ abhinivisitvā mahāgahanaṁ chindituṁ nisadasilāyaṁ
atk-s0508a10:63_8: pharasuṁ nisento viya kilesagahanaṁ chindituṁ lokanātho ñāṇapharasuṁ tejento buddhabhāvāya hetusampattiyā
atk-s0508a10:63_9: paripākaṁ gatattā sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamāya vipassanaṁ gabbhaṁ gaṇhāpento antarantarā nānāsamāpattiyo
atk-s0508a10:63_10: samāpajjitvā yathāvavatthāpite nāmarūpe tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā anupadadhammavipassanāvasena anekākāravokārasaṅkhāre
atk-s0508a10:63_11: sammasanto chattiṁsakoṭisatasahassamukhena sammasanavāraṁ vitthāretvā tattha mahāvajirañāṇasaṅkhāte vipassanāñāṇe
atk-s0508a10:63_12: tikkhe sūre pasanne vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvena pavattamāne yadā taṁ maggena ghaṭeti,
atk-s0508a10:63_13: tadā maggapaṭipāṭiyā diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṁ khepento aggamaggakkhaṇe sammāsambodhiṁ adhigacchati nāma,
atk-s0508a10:63_15: Sammāsambuddhabhāvato dasabalacatuvesārajjādayopi tassa tadā hatthagatāyeva hontīti ayaṁ tāva abhisamayato sammāsambodhipaṭipadā.
atk-s0508a10:63_16: Tadatthato pana mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya yāva tusitabhavane nibbatti,
atk-s0508a10:63_19: taṁ sabbākārasampannaṁ cariyāpiṭakavaṇṇanāyaṁ vitthārato vuttamevāti tattha vuttanayeneva gahetabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a10:64_0: Paccekabodhisattāpi paccekabodhiyā katābhinīhārā anupubbena sambhatapaccekasambodhisambhārā tādise kāle
atk-s0508a10:64_1: carimattabhāve ṭhitā ñāṇassa paripākagatabhāvena upaṭṭhitaṁ saṁveganimittaṁ gahetvā savisesaṁ bhavādīsu
atk-s0508a10:64_2: ādīnavaṁ disvā sayambhūñāṇena pavatti pavattihetuṁ nivatti nivattihetuñca paricchinditvā ‘‘so ‘idaṁ dukkha’nti
atk-s0508a10:64_3: yoniso manasi karotī’’tiādinā āgatanayena catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṁ paribrūhentā attano abhinīhārānurūpaṁ
atk-s0508a10:64_4: saṅkhāre parimaddantā anukkamena vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā aggamaggaṁ adhigacchantā paccekasambodhiṁ
atk-s0508a10:64_6: aggaphalakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya paccekasambuddhā nāma hutvā sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyā honti.
atk-s0508a10:65_0: Sāvakā pana satthu sabrahmacārino vā catusaccakammaṭṭhānakathaṁ sutvā tasmiṁyeva khaṇe kālantare vā tajjaṁ
atk-s0508a10:65_1: paṭipattiṁ anutiṭṭhantā ghaṭentā vāyamantā vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā,
atk-s0508a10:65_3: saccāni paṭivijjhantā attano abhinīhārānurūpasiddhiaggasāvakabhūmiyā vā kevalaṁ vā aggamaggakkhaṇe sāvakasambodhiṁ adhigacchanti nāma.
atk-s0508a10:65_4: Tato paraṁ sāvakabuddhā nāma honti sadevake loke aggadakkhiṇeyyā.
atk-s0508a10:65_5: Evaṁ tāva abhisamayato paccekasambodhi sāvakasambodhi ca veditabbā.
atk-s0508a10:66_0: Tadatthato pana yathā mahābodhisattānaṁ heṭṭhimaparicchedena cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappānaṁ satasahassañca
atk-s0508a10:66_1: bodhisambhārasambharaṇaṁ icchitabbaṁ majjhimaparicchedena aṭṭha asaṅkhyeyyāni kappānaṁ satasahassañca,
atk-s0508a10:66_2: uparimaparicchedena soḷasa asaṅkhyeyyāni kappānaṁ satasahassañca ete ca bhedā paññādhikasaddhādhikavīriyādhikavasena veditabbā.
atk-s0508a10:66_3: Paññādhikānañhi saddhā mandā hoti paññā tikkhā,
atk-s0508a10:66_4: tato ca upāyakosallassa visadanipuṇabhāvena nacirasseva pāramiyo pāripūriṁ gacchanti.
atk-s0508a10:66_5: Saddhādhikānaṁ paññā majjhimā hotīti tesaṁ nātisīghaṁ nātisaṇikaṁ pāramiyo pāripūriṁ gacchanti.
atk-s0508a10:66_6: Vīriyādhikānaṁ pana paññā mandā hotīti tesaṁ cireneva pāramiyo pāripūriṁ gacchanti.
atk-s0508a10:66_8: Tesañhi satipi paññādhikabhāve dve asaṅkhyeyyāni kappānaṁ satasahassañca bodhisambhārasambharaṇaṁ icchitabbaṁ,
atk-s0508a10:66_10: Saddhādhikavīriyādhikāpi vuttaparicchedato paraṁ katipaye eva kappe atikkamitvā paccekasambodhiṁ abhisambujjhanti,
atk-s0508a10:66_13: tesaṁ ekaṁ asaṅkhyeyyaṁ kappānaṁ satasahassañca sambhārasambharaṇaṁ icchitabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a10:66_16: tathā buddhassa mātāpitūnaṁ upaṭṭhākassa puttassa ca.
atk-s0508a10:70_0: Evaṁ vutte aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā katapaṇidhānānaṁ mahābodhisattānaṁ mahābhinīhārato pabhuti savisesaṁ
atk-s0508a10:70_1: dānādīsu yuttappayuttānaṁ divase divase vessantaradānasadisaṁ mahādānaṁ dentānaṁ tadanurūpasīlādike sabbapāramidhamme
atk-s0508a10:70_2: ācinantānampi yathāvuttakālaparicchedaṁ asampatvā antarā eva buddhabhāvappatti nāma natthi. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a10:70_4: Paricchinnakāle nipphāditaṁ viya hi sassaṁ buddhañāṇaṁ yathāparicchinnakālavaseneva vuddhiṁ viruḷhiṁ
atk-s0508a10:70_5: vepullaṁ āpajjantaṁ gabbhaṁ gaṇhantaṁ paripākaṁ gacchatīti evaṁ –
atk-s0508a10:72_0: Adhikāro chandatā ete, abhinīhārakāraṇā’’ti. (su. ni. aṭṭha. 1.khaggavisāṇasuttavaṇṇanā) –
atk-s0508a10:73_0: Ime pañca dhamme samodhānetvā katābhinīhārānaṁ paccekabodhisattānaṁ ‘‘adhikāro chandatā’’ti dvaṅgasamannāgatāya
atk-s0508a10:73_1: patthanāya vasena katapaṇidhānānaṁ sāvakabodhisattānañca tattha tattha vuttakālaparicchedaṁ asampatvā
atk-s0508a10:73_2: antarā eva paccekasambodhiyā yathāvuttasāvakasambodhiyā ca adhigamo natthi. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a10:73_4: Imesampi hi yathā mahābodhisattānaṁ dānādipāramīhi paribrūhitā paññāpāramī anukkamena gabbhaṁ gaṇhantī paripākaṁ gacchantī buddhañāṇaṁ paripūreti,
atk-s0508a10:73_5: evaṁ dānādīhi paribrūhitā anupubbena yathārahaṁ gabbhaṁ gaṇhantī paripākaṁ gacchantī paccekabodhiñāṇaṁ sāvakabodhiñāṇañca paripūreti.
atk-s0508a10:73_6: Dānaparicayena hete tattha tattha bhave alobhajjhāsayatāya sabbattha asaṅgamānasā anapekkhacittā hutvā,
atk-s0508a10:73_7: sīlaparicayena susaṁvutakāyavācatāya suparisuddhakāyavacīkammantā parisuddhājīvā indriyesu guttadvārā
atk-s0508a10:73_8: bhojane mattaññuno hutvā jāgariyānuyogena cittaṁ samādahanti,
atk-s0508a10:74_0: Evaṁ pana paṭipajjantānaṁ adhikārasampattiyā appakasireneva aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañcābhiññā chaḷabhiññā
atk-s0508a10:74_3: Yañhi paccekabodhiyā sāvakabodhiyā vā atthāya dānādipuññasambharaṇe abbhussahanaṁ,
atk-s0508a10:74_15: Evaṁ dānasīlabhāvanāsu sīlasamādhipaññāsu ca sijjhamānāsu vīriyādayo siddhā eva honti.
atk-s0508a10:74_16: Sāyeva paccekabodhiatthāya sāvakabodhiatthāya ca dānādipaṭipadā tesaṁ bodhisattānaṁ santānassa bhāvanato paribhāvanato bhāvanā nāma.
atk-s0508a10:74_17: Visesato dānasīlādīhi svābhisaṅkhate santāne pavattā samathavipassanāpaṭipadā,
atk-s0508a10:75_4: pubbayogāvacaro diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacca aññaṁ ārādheti,
atk-s0508a10:75_5: no ce diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacca aññaṁ ārādheti,
atk-s0508a10:75_9: atha pacchime kāle paccekasambuddho hotī’’ti (su. ni. aṭṭha.
atk-s0508a10:76_1: abhisamayasaṅkhātāya maggabhāvanāya ca bhāvitattabhāvā buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakā bhāvitattā nāma.
atk-s0508a10:77_0: Ettha ca ‘‘sīhānaṁvā’’ti iminā therānaṁ sīhasamānavuttitādassanena attano paṭipakkhehi anabhibhavanīyataṁ,
atk-s0508a10:77_3: gāthā’’ti iminā theragāthānaṁ sīhanādasadisatādassanena tāsaṁ paravādehi anabhibhavanīyataṁ,
atk-s0508a10:77_11: Tasmiṁ sati paṭipassaddhīppahānaṁ nissaraṇappahānañca siddhameva hoti,
atk-s0508a10:77_13: Maggakkhaṇe hi ariyā appamādabhāvanaṁ bhāventi nāma,
atk-s0508a10:78_4: Sīlena ca tesaṁ paṭipattiyā ādikalyāṇatā dassitā,
atk-s0508a10:78_9: 2.90) ca vacanato sīlaṁ paṭipattiyā ādikalyāṇaṁva avippaṭisārādiguṇāvahattā.
atk-s0508a10:78_18: paññuttarato kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ sāva kalyāṇā iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu tādibhāvāvahattā.
atk-s0508a10:80_0: Evaṁ nindāpasaṁsāsu, na samiñjanti paṇḍitā’’ti. (dha. pa. 81) –
atk-s0508a10:83_0: Tathā sīlasampadāya tesaṁ kāmasukhānuyogasaṅkhātassa antassa parivajjanaṁ dasseti.
atk-s0508a10:83_3: Tathā sīlasampadāya tesaṁ vītikkamappahānaṁ kilesānaṁ dasseti.
atk-s0508a10:84_1: cittabhāvanā paññābhāvanāti tisso bhāvanā veditabbā kāyabhāvanāya tadantogadhattā.
atk-s0508a10:84_2: Sīlabhāvanā ca paṭipattiyā ādīti sabbaṁ purimasadisaṁ .
atk-s0508a10:84_3: Yathā pana sīhanādaṁ pare migagaṇā na sahanti,
atk-s0508a10:84_5: aññadatthu sīhanādova te abhibhavati evameva aññatitthiyavādā therānaṁ vāde na sahanti,
atk-s0508a10:84_13: Na hi dhammato sakkā kenaci aññathā kātuṁ appaṭivattanīyato.
atk-s0508a10:85_2: te sādhāraṇavasena nāmato gottato guṇato ca kittetuṁ ‘‘yathānāmā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a10:85_3: Asādhāraṇato pana tattha tattha gāthāsveva āvibhavissati.
atk-s0508a10:85_5: subhūti mahākoṭṭhikotiādinā nayena nāmadheyyena paññātāti attho.
atk-s0508a10:85_7: gotamo kassapotiādinā nayena kulapadesena yāya yāya jātiyā paññātāti attho.
atk-s0508a10:85_9: pariyattiparamatāyaṁ aṭṭhatvā yathānurūpaṁ samāpattivihārino hutvā vihariṁsūti attho.
atk-s0508a10:85_10: Atha vā yathādhammavihārinoti yathādhammā vihārino ca,
atk-s0508a10:85_11: yādisasīlādidhammā dibbavihārādīsu abhiṇhaso viharamānā yādisavihārā cāti attho.
atk-s0508a10:85_12: Yathādhimuttāti yādisaadhimuttikā saddhādhimuttipaññādhimuttīsu yaṁyaṁadhimuttikā suññatamukhādīsu vā yathā yathā nibbānaṁ adhimuttāti yathādhimuttā.
atk-s0508a10:86_0: ‘‘Assaddho akataññū ca, sandhicchedo ca yo naro’’tiādi. (dha. pa. 97).
atk-s0508a10:87_2: Sappaññāti tihetukapaṭisandhipaññāya pārihārikapaññāya bhāvanāpaññāya cāti tividhāyapi paññāya paññavanto.
atk-s0508a10:87_3: Vihariṁsūti tāya eva sappaññatāya yathāladdhena phāsuvihāreneva vasiṁsu.
atk-s0508a10:88_0: Ettha ca pana nāmagottaggahaṇena tesaṁ therānaṁ pakāsapaññātabhāvaṁ dasseti.
atk-s0508a10:88_7: ‘‘atanditā’’ti iminā evaṁ attahitasampattiyaṁ ṭhitānaṁ parahitapaṭipattiṁ dasseti.
atk-s0508a10:89_0: Atha vā ‘‘yathānāmā’’ti idaṁ tesaṁ therānaṁ garūhi gahitanāmadheyyadassanaṁ samaññāmattakittanato.
atk-s0508a10:89_4: ‘‘Yathādhimuttā sappaññā’’ti idaṁ nesaṁ vijjāsampattidassanaṁ āsavakkhayapariyosānāya ñāṇasampattiyā adhigamaparidīpanato.
atk-s0508a10:89_8: Na hi sammāappaṇihitattano pubbe ca akatapuññassa saddhānusārīdhammānusārino gottasampattisamudāgamo sambhavati.
atk-s0508a10:89_10: Na hi appatirūpe dese vasato sappurisūpanissayarahitassa ca tādisā guṇavisesā sambhavanti.
atk-s0508a10:89_12: Na hi paratoghosena vinā sāvakānaṁ saccasampaṭivedho sambhavati.
atk-s0508a10:89_13: ‘‘Sappaññā atanditā’’ti iminā yathāvuttassa guṇavisesassa abyabhicārihetuṁ dasseti ñāyārambhadassanato.
atk-s0508a10:90_1: ‘‘yathāgottā’’ti ettha gottakittanena tesaṁ therānaṁ yonisomanasikārasampadaṁ dasseti yathāvuttagottasampannassa yonisomanasikārasambhavato.
atk-s0508a10:90_2: ‘‘Yathādhammavihārino’’ti ettha dhammavihāraggahaṇena saddhammasavanasampadaṁ dasseti saddhammasavanena vinā tadabhāvato.
atk-s0508a10:90_5: ‘‘Atanditā’’ti iminā vuttanayena attahitasampattiṁ paripūretvā ṭhitānaṁ paresaṁ hitasukhāvahāya paṭipattiyaṁ akilāsubhāvaṁ dasseti.
atk-s0508a10:90_6: Tathā ‘‘yathāgottā’’ti iminā nesaṁ saraṇagamanasampadā dassitā saddhānusārīgottakittanato.
atk-s0508a10:90_11: paññā pariyosānanti ādimajjhapariyosānadassanena sabbepi sāvakaguṇā dassitā honti.
atk-s0508a10:91_0: Īdisī pana guṇavibhūti yāya sammāpaṭipattiyā tehi adhigatā,
atk-s0508a10:91_2: Tattha tatthāti tesu tesu araññarukkhamūlapabbatādīsu vivittasenāsanesu.
atk-s0508a10:91_3: Tattha tatthāti vā tasmiṁ tasmiṁ udānādikāle.
atk-s0508a10:91_6: pañcamaṁ visuddhiṁ adhigantvā paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā matthakaṁ pāpanavasena vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā
atk-s0508a10:91_9: Tañhi sayaṁ acavanadhammattā adhigatānaṁ accutihetubhāvato ca natthi ettha cutīti ‘‘accutaṁ’’.
atk-s0508a10:91_10: Saṅkhatadhammehi asammissabhāvatāya tadatthikehi paṭipajjitabbatāya ca ‘‘pada’’nti ca vuccati.
atk-s0508a10:91_13: so attano paccayehi uppāditattā kato nāma.
atk-s0508a10:91_14: Tassa pana pariyosānabhūtaṁ phalaṁ katantoti adhippetaṁ.
atk-s0508a10:91_16: Atha vā paccayehi katattā nipphāditattā katā nāma saṅkhatadhammā,
atk-s0508a10:91_19: Paccavekkhantāti ‘‘adhigataṁ vata mayā ariyamaggādhigamena idaṁ ariyaphalaṁ,
atk-s0508a10:91_20: adhigatā asaṅkhatā dhātū’’ti ariyaphalanibbānāni vimuttiñāṇadassanena paṭipattiṁ avekkhamānā.
atk-s0508a10:91_21: Atha vā saccasampaṭivedhavasena yaṁ ariyena karaṇīyaṁ pariññādisoḷasavidhaṁ kiccaṁ aggaphale ṭhitena nipphāditattā pariyosāpitattā kataṁ nāma,
atk-s0508a10:91_24: Purimanayena pana itarapaccavekkhaṇānīti ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇāni dassitāni honti.
atk-s0508a10:92_0: Imamatthanti ettha imanti sakalo theratherīgāthānaṁ attho attano itaresañca tattha sannipatitānaṁ dhammasaṅgāhakamahātherānaṁ
atk-s0508a10:92_1: buddhiyaṁ viparivattamānatāya āsanno paccakkhoti ca katvā vuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a10:92_2: Atthanti ‘‘channā me kuṭikā’’tiādīhi gāthāhi vuccamānaṁ attūpanāyikaṁ parūpanāyikaṁ lokiyalokuttarapaṭisaṁyuttaṁ atthaṁ.
atk-s0508a10:92_4: taṁdīpaniyo idāni mayā vuccamānā tesaṁ bhāvitattānaṁ gāthā attūpanāyikā suṇāthāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a10:92_5: Te ca mahātherā evaṁ kathentā attano sammāpaṭipattipakāsanīhi gāthāhi sāsanassa ekantaniyyānikavibhāvanena
atk-s0508a10:92_6: parepi tattha sammāpaṭipattiyaṁ niyojentīti etamatthaṁ dīpeti āyasmā dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko,
atk-s0508a10:92_7: tathā dīpento ca imāhi gāthāhi tesaṁ thomanaṁ tāsañca tesaṁ vacanassa nidānabhāvena ṭhapanaṁ ṭhānagatamevāti dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
